--- Switchblade ---

Switchblade keeps smiling, masking his true feelings, "Firestrike's 
not that smart, and he probably got confused and sent a commlink to 
me, instead of you. I'm glad that I didn't make them have truck 
modes," he shudders, "they would have been really stupid then. I can 
change their programming to fix the insignificant problem if you 
want, Lord Meggy." Switchblade glances to Motormaster, to make sure 
he caught the barbed words, then he turns back to Megatron.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> Megatron snarls, "Motormaster can explain, after you explain to me 
what
> Firestrike and Nightstrike are doing?" he finishes, the low tone in 
his
> voice showing he wasnt in the mood to play. 
> 
> Motormaster could not help but chuckle.
